Comment: *Sitting in a bus shelter, he explains that two-thirds of New Yorkers support his plan for city-owned grocery stores, while three-fourths support making buses free...   In front of a city park blooming with daffodils, he reports that 80 percent of New Yorkers support his plan to freeze the rent.*  If he doesn't beat Cuomo in the June primary, I'll bet he will take him down next time. That rent freeze has to be the biggest draw. (and he can do it right away)
